review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Were you able to address and let go of some unfinished emotional business yesterday?
            That put you on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Appreciate who you are. Strive to be the best version of yourself (Pillar #1)
step_of_the_day.content:
"The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be." - Ralph Waldo EmersonAn important part of developing self-confidence is the full embracing of yourself. This doesnâ€™t mean you
            love everything about yourself. But it does mean that you accept everything about yourself.

action_step:
Identify the qualities about yourself that you appreciate. Identify the parts of yourself that you admire
            and feel good about. Have your healthy internal parent speak to you from a place of acceptance and support.
journal_entry: Write about your positive feelings toward yourself.
